name: nat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short for nationalist (= a person who wants their country to be politically independent, especially a member of a political party fighting for this): The President of Glasgow University Scottish Nationalist Association said student Nats were against the bombings. The Nats have promised to hold an independence referendum on gaining office.
More examplesFewer examplesNeither will Mr McConnell be attempting to "out-Nat the Nats " by painting himself as more Scottish than the Nationalists.The headline read "Cape Nats Back Anton Rupert".
